column4: Does anyone know of an application that will turn multiple .png pictures into .svg and resize them at the same time, and NO I am not intrested of knowing what vectors and other stuff is, -> I did manage to convert .png to .svg via inkscape, but I have ALOT of files to do, so doing it manually would take too much time
if Inkscape could do it, how come others (according to you) is impossible
check up on the command, i haven't tested
